# DocMemo Alzheimer's Research Finder

> Free online memory questionnaire and clinical trial matching service.

## What we do
- **Free Memory Assessment**: A 10-minute online questionnaire to screen for memory issues.
- **Clinical Trial Matching**: We match individuals with Alzheimer's clinical trials based on their profile.
- **Local Connection**: We connect participants to local research centers in California and Florida.

## Key Pages
- [Home - Location Selection](https://alzheimer-research.docmemo.com/)
- [California Research Centers](https://alzheimer-research.docmemo.com/california/los-angeles-orange-riverside/)

## Locations Served
- **California**: Los Angeles, Orange County, Riverside, Irvine, Long Beach, Inglewood.
- **Florida**: Marion County (Ocala) - *Coming Soon*.

## Scientific Foundation
Our approach is based on computational modeling research from:
- **Paris Brain Institute (Institut du Cerveau - ICM)**
- **Inria**: Research on Alzheimer's disease and personalized medicine.
- **AAIC 2025**: Presented at the Alzheimer's Association International Conference.

## Contact & Organization
- **Website**: [https://docmemo.com](https://docmemo.com)
- **Company**: [Qairnel](https://qairnel.com)
- **Founder**: Dr. Stanley Durrleman, PhD (Paris Brain Institute)
